context_of_use: This use case allows customers to add products to their shopping cart in preparation for purchase.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to purchase multiple items easily
description: Enable customers to add products to their shopping cart in preparation for purchase.
triggering_event: Customer selects a product to add to the cart.
preconditions: Customer is logged into their account.
Customer has selected at least one product.
postconditions: The selected product is added to the customer's shopping cart.
assumptions: The customer has a valid account.
The product is available for purchase.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to add products to their cart.
main_flow: 1. Customer selects a product → System adds the product to the shopping cart.
2. Customer views the shopping cart → System displays the updated cart contents.
